Basic Attack

At-Will âœ¦ Poison, Sleep

Standard

Reach 2

+19 vs AC; 2d10+6 damage, and the target takes ongoing 5 poison damage (save ends). First Failed Saving Throw: The target falls unconscious (save ends).

Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard

Reach 2

+19 vs AC; 1d10+4 damage.

At-Will

Standard

The dragon makes a bite attack and a claw attack.

At-Will âœ¦ Fear, Illusion

Minor, At-Will

Ranged 10

+20 vs Will; the target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of the mirage dragon's next turn.

Recharge 5-6 âœ¦ Charm, Psychic

Standard

Close blast 6

+20 vs Will; 1d12+9 psychic damage, and on its turn the target must either move twice its speed away from the dragon or attack its nearest ally (save ends). Aftereffect: The target is weakened (save ends).

Encounter âœ¦ Fear

Standard

Close burst 10

Targets enemies; +19 vs Will; the target is stunned until the end of the dragon's next turn. Aftereffect: The target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls (save ends).

Encounter âœ¦ Illusion, Psychic, Zone

Standard

Area burst 6 within 10

Sustain Minor

+18 vs Will; 2d6+9 psychic damage, and the target is slowed (save ends). The burst creates a zone that counts as difficult terrain for all creatures except the dragon. A creature that enters or starts its turn in the zone takes 10 psychic damage.

Encounter âœ¦ Teleportation

Free

Trigger: When first bloodied

The mirage dragon teleports 6 squares.
